content: Tumhara adhikaar sirf karm karne mein hai, phal par nahi.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Atma na kabhi janm leti hai na kabhi marti hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Dhyaan mein siddh ho jao toh mann bina hawa ke deepak ki lauh ki tarah sthir ho jata hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Apna karm karo, par uske phal se kabhi jud mat jao.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo apne mann ko jeet leta hai, uska mann uska dost ban jata hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Insaan apne vishwas se hi gadhita hota hai. Jaise sochta hai, waise hi ban jata hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Shaanti, namrata, maun, swayam-niyantran aur pavitrata ye mann ki tapasya hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Dharma ke marg par chalte hue kabhi kuchh vyarth nahi jata.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Mann chanchal hai, par abhyas aur vairagya se ise niyantrit kiya ja sakta hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Vivekhi vyakti karm ke phal se alag hokar sirf karm par dhyaan deta hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo karm mein akarm aur akarm mein karm dekhta hai, wohi sachcha gyani hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Yog atma ka safar hai â€” apne aap se apne aap tak.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Gyaan se bada koi pavitra karne wala nahi.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo vyakti nishchint, nishkalank aur nirbhay rehta hai, wahi param shanti ko prapt karta hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Indriyon se milne wale sukh dukh ka karan hote hain; unki shuruaat aur ant hota hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Har karm ko Ishwar ko arpan karke karo, tab bandhan nahi lagega.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jisne apne mann ko jeet liya hai, uske liye mann sabse bada mitra hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Nishkaam seva se hi manushya poornata ko prapt hota hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo vyakti har sthiti mein samaan rehta hai, wahi yogi kehlata hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Kaam hi manushya ka sabse bada shatru hai, jo ichhaon se janm leta hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo gyaan aur karm mein santulan bana leta hai, wahi uttam yogi hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Asang rehkar kiya gaya karm moksha ka marg hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo hota hai accha hi hota hai, jo hoga accha hi hoga.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo vyakti lobh, krodh aur moh ko jeet leta hai, woh hi sachcha shaktishaali hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Karm ki gati ati gupt hoti hai, ise samajhna kathin hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Samay ke saath sabhi dukh mita jaate hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Shuddh mann aur shraddha se kiya gaya karm hi safalta deta hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Mann aur indriyon ko sanyam karna hi yog hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Sukh dukh ko ek samaan drishti se dekhna hi sthirta hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jis par Kripa ho jaaye, usey koi rok nahi sakta.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jisne apne ichhaon ko niyantrit kar liya, usne jeevan ko niyantrit kar liya.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Maya ke jaal mein phas kar manushya apni shakti bhool jata hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jitna adhik asakti hogi, utna adhik dukh milega.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo sab mein ek hi Ishwar ko dekhta hai, wahi yatharth ko dekhta hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo vyakti apne kartavya ko premaur nishtha se karta hai, woh mujhe priya hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Asafalta ka dar mat rakho, kyonki safalta ka beej har prayas mein hota hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jis mann mein shanti nahi, usse sukh nahi mil sakta.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Gussa andhkar ka dwar hai, vichaaron ko vinash kar deta hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Samatva yog ka pratham charan hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Koi bhi karm bina vishwas ke phal nahi deta.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo vyakti apne kaam se pyaar karta hai, woh kabhi haar nahi maanta.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Mann hi bandhan ka kaaran hai, aur mann hi moksha ka.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Krodh se vichaar shuddh nahi rehte, aur shuddh vichaar hi safalta laate hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo deta hai bina kisi ichha ke, woh hi sachcha daata hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Shraddha hi jeevan ka adhaar hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jisne apna mann sthir kar liya, uske liye jeevan saral ho jata hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo satya aur dharma par chal raha hai, usse koi hara nahi sakta.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Har jeev mein mujhe hi dekho, tab tum mujhe kabhi nahi bhoologe.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Asakti hi dukh ka mool hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo khud ko jeet leta hai, woh hi sabse bada vijeta hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Seva aur daya se bada koi dharm nahi.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jeevan parivartan se bhara hai; badlav hi sthirta hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Gyaan ki roshni se andhkaar mit jata hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Har chhota karm bhi mahatvapurn hota hai jab shraddha se kiya jaaye.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo doosron ke dukh me dukh mahsoos kare, woh hi sachcha insaan hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Niyam aur sanyam se jeevan khilta hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Sansaar ek rangmanch hai; apna kartavya nibhao.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo mann ko niyantrit kar leta hai, uske liye sab kuchh sambhav hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Daya, prem aur kshama se bada koi bal nahi.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo gyaan se drishti badal jaati hai, uska jeevan badal jaata hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Sahi samay ka intezaar nahi, sahi karm ka karo.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo har sthiti mein santulit rehta hai, woh hi yogi hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Aasakti se pareshaani, aur nishkaamta se shanti milti hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo sacchai se judta hai, woh kabhi girta nahi.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Aatma ka gyaan hi jeevan ki sabse badi sampatti hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo swayam se santushth hai, usko bahar se kuchh nahi chahiye.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Sukh dukh dono anitya hain; dono se pare ho jao.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo karm ko Ishwararpit karta hai, woh bandhan se mukt ho jata hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jeevan ka uddeshya swayam ko pehchanna hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Mann ki shuddhi hi sadhana ka lakshya hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jab tak asakti hai, tab tak dukh hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Guru aur gyaan ke bina mukti nahi.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Sankalp hi srishti ka beej hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo samarpit hota hai, usse sab kuchh milta hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Iswar sabke hriday mein virajmaan hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo apne man ko hi nahi samajh sakta, woh sansaar ko kya samjhega?
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Tyag hi sachcha bal deta hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Har jeev mein Ishwar ke roop ko dekho.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo kaam shanti se hota hai, woh hi safalta deta hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Karm aur gyaan ka samanvay hi mukti ka marg hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Sneh aur daya se bada koi punyakarm nahi.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jisne apne dar ko jeet liya, usne jeevan jeet liya.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Sthirta aur dhairya hi yogi ka alankaar hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo khud sachcha ho, uske paas sab sachchai aati hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Aatma ajar amar hai; yeh kabhi naash nahi hoti.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo apne kartavya se nahi mukarta, wahi veer hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Sansaar ki sab cheezein kshanik hain, par aatma nitya hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo sakarata rakhta hai, uske saath sakaratmak ghatnaayein hoti hain.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Agyan andhkaar hai; gyaan uska uday hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo logon ki bhalaai karta hai, uska bhala svayam hota hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo daan bina kisi ichha ke deta hai, woh satvik daan hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Har atma mujhe priya hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Karm ki shuddhi hi jeevan ki shuddhi hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jeevan ek yatra hai, gyaan uska margdarshak.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Sachcha yogi bina asaakti ke jeeta hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo apne hriday ko paavan rakhta hai, woh Ishwar ke kareeb hota hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Bhakti se bada koi marg nahi.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Har din ko antim din samajh kar karm karo.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Jo vyakti apne gyaan ko jeevan mein utarta hai, wahi sachcha gyani hai.
author: Bhagavad Gita

content: Mukti tab milti hai jab mann, vaani aur karm sab ek ho jaayein.
author: Bhagavad Gita
